name: Monero Policy Workgroup
description: The Monero Policy Working Group (MPWG) is a loosely formed quorum of individuals that contribute to the Monero [open-source](https://github.com/monero-project) project. The goal of MPWG is to work with regulators, policy makers, and the wider financial services sector to ensure broad understanding of Monero, and other privacy-preserving cryptocurrencies, is communicated.
